body_html:
This is still broken for me on master while working on testcases. Minimal repro with

import torch
import torch.nn as nn
from torch.autograd import Variable

encoder = nn.Embedding(10, 100, max_norm=1.0)
encoder = encoder.cuda().half()
inp = Variable(torch.arange(10).cuda().long())

out = encoder(inp)

body:
This is still broken for me on master while working on testcases. Minimal repro with 
```
import torch
import torch.nn as nn
from torch.autograd import Variable

encoder = nn.Embedding(10, 100, max_norm=1.0)
encoder = encoder.cuda().half()
inp = Variable(torch.arange(10).cuda().long())

out = encoder(inp)
```
